# SCENIC:Single Cell rEgulatory Network Inference and Clustering

## Input
The `runSCENIC()` function requires a `SingleCellExperiment` object that includes cell clustering information. For details, refer to the [Clustering](#FindClusters) session.

## SCENIC
Wrapper function for SCENIC^[<https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/aertslab/SCENIC/blob/master/inst/doc/SCENIC_Running.htm>].

```{r}
library(sclet)

# use demo data from SCENIC, mousebrain_sce
sce <- readRDS("data/mousebrain_SCENIC_sce.Rds")
scenicOptions <- runSCENIC(sce, mouse, 10, 
```
